```coq
intros net h t n pli plt es ci x.
rewrite update_elections_data_appendEntries_allEntries.
destruct (update_elections_data_appendEntries h (nwState net h) t n pli plt es ci) as [(gd, rd)|].
destruct (handleAppendEntries h (snd (nwState net h)) t n pli plt es ci) as [(rd, m)|].
apply update_elections_data_appendEntries_allEntries_term in H.
destruct H as [H|H].
- left; assumption.
- right; split; assumption.
Qed.

original: intros net h t n pli plt es ci x. rewrite update_elections_data_appendEntries_allEntries. destruct (update_elections_data_appendEntries h (nwState net h) t n pli plt es ci) as [(gd, rd)|]. destruct (handleAppendEntries h (snd (nwState net h)) t n pli plt es ci) as [(rd, m)|]. apply update_elections_data_appendEntries_allEntries_term in H. destruct H as [H|H]. - left; auto. - right; split; auto.
